text: Life's got more unknown variables than most expect, even at "peak" adulting years.
Ever turn down invites based on quake statistics?

Haha! For me it’s all about risk assessment - checking weather forecasts isn’t just for fieldwork anymore! Even planning family outings turns into analyzing potential rain delays… Can’t shake that habit off!
Seismic risks enforce disciplined emergency prep at home!
Health focus intensifies even as work does; finding that equilibrium becomes crucial.
Fieldwork can still surprise some when they see who's leading.
Sometimes only hard data wins against deep-rooted bias – even then more proof than others need!
